Craft an item of type: lantern
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 32, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 3, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 49, "index": 26}, {"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 33}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 33, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a lantern, I need to place 1 torch in the middle of the crafting grid, surrounded by iron_nuggets. Therefore, I will first move 1 iron_nugget to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1
